item.title: Democratic-led cities and states push back on threats to cut US school funding over DEI
item.description: Some Democratic-led states and cities are pushing back on a Trump administration threat to cut education funding over diversity, equity, and inclusion programs, creating a standoff that could test how far the White House is willing to go to press its demands on the nationâ€™s schools.

item.title: Supreme Court blocks order requiring Trump administration to reinstate thousands of federal workers
